title: Excellent action!...
review: I really wonder how people create kind of stories... After Matrix trilogy and Inception ideologies you can think these are the edge of human mind but not. I watched Source Code three times and I thought I watched this movie as if hundred times but at the end I still was enjoying the story. I think this is a kind of sci-fi movie that filmed without using space, space-crafts, computer created alien-like creatures. I felt this when I watched Bruce Willis' 12 Monkeys. Jake Gyllenhaal is playing excellent role, actually he is finishing all movie alone. Well, if you want to watch good action and sci-fi then you found it...
